segments.text: I'm just standing here, watching this whole scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is really coming down now, flowing over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor, getting wider by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed her foot is practically submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, that poor boy is so high up on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over backward any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's desperately reaching into the cookie jar, one hand holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand out, waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire situation feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to get hurt or make a giant mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is genuinely making me anxious to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside just makes the indoor chaos feel even more intense.
segments.speaker: PAR
